Package command.algorithm.nj

Class StudierKeppler

java.lang.Object
command.algorithm.Algorithm
command.algorithm.nj.NeighbourJoining
command.algorithm.nj.StudierKeppler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICommand<Matrix,​Tree>
public final class StudierKeppler
extends NeighbourJoining
Responsible for calculating a phylogenetic tree from a distance matrix using the Neighbour Joining algorithm by Studier and Keppler.
